item.text: Please provide the information for the best point of contact regarding this reservation.
I am filling out this info as:
Yes! I would like to receive helpful text messages from Ottehr regarding patient education, events, and general information about our offices. Message frequency varies, and data rates may apply.

answerOption.valueString: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

extension.valueString: Our care team uses this to inform treatment recommendations and share helpful information regarding potential medication side effects, as necessary.
Pronoun responses are kept confidential in our system and are used to help us best respect how our patients (up to age 26) wish to be addressed.

item.text: How did you hear about us?

answerOption.valueString: Been there with another child or family member

item.text: A responsible party is the individual responsible for the visit's financial obligations. If the patient is not their own responsible party (most common), then the responsible party must be the patient's legal guardian or legal designee.
Please upload a picture of a Photo ID, Drivers License or Passport of the patient's legal guardian (ie: Patient or Parent/Guardian)
